title: U.S. Watchdog Council Says Justice Department Erred in Blocking Whistleblower Complaint
text:
A U.S. watchdog council has faulted a Justice Department legal memo that initially blocked the Ukraine whistleblower’s complaint, which sparked the impeachment investigation, from reaching Congress.

The memo was wrong in determining the matter wasn’t an urgent concern and recommended the Justice Department either withdraw or modify it, the Council of Inspectors General said. The federal body of government watchdogs warned the memo could have a chilling effect on other government whistleblowers.

...
description: A U.S. watchdog council has faulted a Justice Department legal memo that initially blocked the Ukraine whistleblower’s complaint, which sparked the impeachment investigation, from reaching Congress.
